availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James M. Lane (Simpson County, Kentucky, cabinet maker and farmer)

body.p: Simpson County, Kentucky, cabinet maker and farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Jane Heffington Lane. Father of Stephen Lane, Josephine Lane, Samuel Lane, and John Lane. Cabinet maker in Simpson County, Kentucky in 1850. Farmer in Dallas County, Texas in 1860. Nominated for jailor in Simpson County by the provisional government of Kentucky on December 29, 1861. Farmer in Simpson County in 1864.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Simpson County, p. 18A.
